greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: denominators of polynomials from A000142: P(0,x)=1,P(n,x)=1/n!+x*sum(P(n-i-1)/i!),i=0,1,..,n-1. Numerators are A152650.
comment: a(n) is the last sequence of a trio with, first, A141412 and, second, A142048 (denominators).
example: First column: A000142; second column: A049606. (End)
mathematica: ClearAll[u, p]; u[n_] := 1/n!; p[0][x_] := u[0]; p[n_][x_] := p[n][x] = u[n] + x*Sum[u[i]*p[n-i-1][x] , {i, 0, n-1}] // Expand; row[n_] := CoefficientList[p[n][x], x]; Table[row[n], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten // Denominator (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 02 2012 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Dec 10 2008
